title: Idle Bee: Swarm Simulator
description: Idle Bee: Swarm Simulator is a casual idle game, where you'll take charge of a vibrant bee colony and embark on an epic journey to dominate the hive kingdom! In this casual idle game, you'll dive deep into the exciting life of bees, managing your hive, recruiting worker bees, and training powerful warrior bees to protect your precious honey reserves.
